overview: American traveler Mason Wyler arrives in London with no money and seemingly no hope. Taking the initiative, he gets a job at the local building site, surrounding himself with buff builders. The work is tough but he's not shy to working hard, and soon discovers that these horny young laborers get sweaty in more ways than one. This building site reeks of testosterone and it's not long before the builders are stripping more than the walls! The tools are down and the cocks are out at every available moment, pumping hard and coating each other in delicious spunk. Full of group sex including a huge gangbang finale as they all celebrate a job well done. From toned young Europeans to the permanently randy, well hung Brits, Mason has found himself the dream job, where it's not just the hats that are hard!
title: Builder Boy
